code: import{useCart}from"../context/CartContext";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cart(){const{cart,totalPrice,removeItem,clearCart}=useCart();if(cart.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Tu carrito est\xE1 vac\xEDo \uD83D\uDED2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"btn btn-primary mt-3",children:"Volver al cat\xE1logo"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Carrito de compras"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:cart.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[item.nombre," x ",item.quantity," = $",item.precio*item.quantity,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger btn-sm",onClick:()=>removeItem(item.id),children:"Eliminar"})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Total: $",totalPrice]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-warning me-2",onClick:clearCart,children:"Vaciar carrito"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/checkout",className:"btn btn-success",children:"Finalizar compra"})]})]});}export default Cart;
